body.name: 4K Digital Camera, Photography Autofocus 48MP YouTube Vlogging Camera, 16X Digital Zoom Video Camera Anti-Shake with 32GB Micro Card, Compact Point and Shoot Travel Cameras for Gifts(Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 1 hr 28 mins
features: 🎬【4K Digital Camera for Photography】The 48MP image resolution combined with the 2.8-inch HD IPS screen ensures that your photos and videos are incredibly sharp and vibrant, allowing you to relive every moment with clarity.

📸【Multifunction Video Camera & Anti-Shake】Capture the Perfect Shot. Use the Dial button at the top of the camera. From auto mode for quick and easy shooting to specialized modes like night scene and portrait, this camera offers a variety of shooting modes to suit any situation. With the high sensitivity mode, even low-light conditions won't stop you from capturing amazing photos. Supports Anti-shake.

💥【Point and Shoot Camera & Viewfinder】Look Your Best, Always. The built-in beauty face mode ensures that you and your subjects always look flawless. The self-timer with options of 2S, 5S, and 10S allows you to effortlessly capture stunning selfies or group shots. Built-in viewfinder frame. You can confirm the shooting image using optical imaging.

✈【Travel & Portable Design】Your Perfect Travel Companion With its portable design and compact size, this camera is the ideal travel companion. It also doubles as a webcam, allowing you to connect with your loved ones, vlog, or attend video conferences with ease.

🎁【16X digital zoom & Bonus 32G Micro Card】With the 16x digital zoom, you can get up close to your subjects or capture stunning wide-angle shots of breathtaking landscapes. It's like having a professional lens in your pocket.Start capturing memories right away with the included 32G Micro card. You'll have plenty of storage space for all your photos and videos, allowing you to focus on what matters most - capturing precious moments.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Best Travel Camera For Beginners 4K Digital Camera Discover the power of true visual immersion with our 4K Digital Camera. Every frame comes to life with lifelike colors and unparalleled sharpness, allowing you to relive your memories with breathtaking realism. With intuitive controls and helpful features, you'll be taking stunning photos in no time. From family gatherings to outdoor adventures, our Beginner's Camera allows you to capture memories with clarity and vibrancy. The Best Teenage Gifts A 4K digital camera. Package Content: 1 x 4K Digital Camera 1 x Type-C Cable 1 x User Manual 1 x Adapter 1 x Dust bag 1 x Lanyard rope 1 x 32G Micro Card 2 x Rechargeable batteries

16X Digital Zoom The 16X digital zoom! Capture every detail and bring your photography skills to the next level. With this powerful zoom feature, you can now get closer to your subject without compromising image quality. Whether you're shooting stunning landscapes or capturing precious moments, this zoom lens will ensure sharp and clear images like never before. Auto-Focus & Anti Shake Experience the ultimate clarity and stability with our Auto-Focus & Anti Shake technology. Say goodbye to blurry shots and hello to crystal-clear images. Our advanced autofocus system ensures that your subject is always in sharp focus, no matter how fast-paced the action. Combined with the Anti Shake feature, this technology minimizes camera shake, delivering steady shots even in low-light conditions. 2.88 Inch IPS Screen The 2.88 Inch IPS Screen! Immerse yourself in vivid visuals and enjoy a larger and more immersive viewing experience. With its IPS technology, this screen offers wide viewing angles and accurate color reproduction, ensuring that every detail comes to life.Its compact size makes it portable, perfect for on-the-go use. Elevate your visual experience and indulge in the brilliance of the 2.88 Inch IPS Screen. Get ready to see the world in a whole new way!

Easy to Operate Experience effortless control with our Easy to Operate toggle button. Simplify your user experience and navigate through functions with ease. This intuitive button allows you to toggle between different modes and settings effortlessly, saving you time and frustration. Whether you're adjusting settings, switching between modes, or accessing advanced features, our Easy to Operate toggle button ensures a seamless and user-friendly experience. Built-in Fill Light Illuminate your world with the built-in fill light. Capture stunning photos and videos even in low-light conditions. Say goodbye to dark and grainy images! The built-in fill light provides the perfect amount of light to ensure that your subjects are well-lit and beautifully illuminated. Whether you're capturing memories indoors or in dimly lit environments, this feature clear and vibrant results. Travel Camera with Viewfinder Your perfect companion for capturing unforgettable moments on your adventures. With its convenient built-in viewfinder, you can frame your shots with precision and creativity, just like a professional photographer. No more relying solely on the LCD screen, the viewfinder provides a clear and immersive view, even in bright sunlight. Compact and lightweight, this travel camera is designed to accompany you on all your journeys. From breathtaking landscapes to candid portraits, capture every detail and make your travel memories last a lifetime.

Specification: White balance: Auto/Daylight/Cloudy/Tungsten/Fluorescent Memory card: Support Micro SD card (Recommend 4GB to 128GB Class10 U1) Monitor: 2.88 Inch IPS HD Screen Still image: Single/Continuous shooting2/5/10-second timer USB port: Type C cable Digital zoom: 4X/8X/16X Battery: Rechargeable Lithium lon Polymer Battery Focal length: f=3.37mm Aperture: Aperture/2.2 Power saving: 3 minutes/5 minutes/10 minutes/Automatic Operating system requirements: Windows 7,Windows 8, Windows 10 Beauty face: On / Off (default)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I must say I am thoroughly impressed with its performance and features. This camera has quickly become an essential tool in my daily vlogging.The 4K video capability of this camera is simply exceptional. The clarity, sharpness, and color accuracy of the footage it captures are outstanding, autofocus system on this camera is quick and accurate this camera delivers stunning high-resolution photos. It's a great bonus to have a 32GB SD card included with the camera. It's an excellent starter storage solution, and you can always upgrade to a larger card if needed.This 4K Digital Camera for Photography and Vlogging offers a fantastic package of features for both beginners and more experienced photographers and vloggers. It's a versatile and user-friendly camera that delivers exceptional image and video quality. If you're looking to step up your photography or vlogging game, this camera is an excellent choice, and I highly recommend it. It's a worthy investment that will undoubtedly help you capture and create stunning content.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: As a beginner, I've been searching for a high-quality camera that won't break the bank, and it seems like this one might be just what I need. I purchased this camera to use for my Japan vacation. It's perfect for any type of photo, and the screen is crisp and clear. I am impressed with the portability and lightweight design. I also love it comes with 2 batteries, a strap, dust bag, and a lens cap and 64 GB as well. It's stylish enough that when I'm not snapping photos, it easily blends in as a chic decoration on my shelf. Everything is straightforward and didn’t take me long to figure out all its settings and features. I randomly took a picture of my dog the quality of the picture is way better than I expected. I really love the old style picture.

reviews.reviewerName: John and Dawn ReynoldsJohn and Dawn Reynolds
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and great price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. They thought of everything when they came out with this camera! It comes with a lens cover, lens cloth, 2 batteries, an SD card, a strap for carrying, plus a soft portable bag, and the 2 different wire connectors for uploading! This camera has a great picture quality. You can choose between multiple, multiple shot functions and videos. It is extremely easy to use. Pretty self explanatory when you start exploring the functions. It's sold at a great price as well! Would make an amazing Christmas gift for those loved ones that whom like to capture every moment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 4K Digital Camera, and it has exceeded my expectations. The 48MP resolution delivers stunningly detailed photos, and the autofocus feature ensures sharp and clear images. The 2.8” screen is a handy size for framing shots, and the 16X digital zoom allows me to cover more distance without sacrificing that much qualityI’m impressed by the anti-shake technology, which noticeably improves video stability, making my vlogs much smoother. The included 32GB SD card is a thoughtful addition, saving me the trouble of purchasing one separately.Its compact design makes it perfect for travel, and the camera’s user-friendly interface makes it accessible for beginners. I believe this camera would make an excellent gift for photography enthusiasts or vloggers. Overall, a fantastic purchase with a great balance of features and practicality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Something Wrong with the Sound?
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for one purpose, to take video of various piano performances in various locations. I wanted something easy to use, easy to carry, with quality video and sound.The video is fine but the audio is unusable, awful, terrible. Maybe the one I got was defective. At first I tried it doing the way I've done it with other cameras and phones. I set it right on the piano and it sounded like the most grungy, distorted metal guitar you've ever heard. So I was disappointed but thought, well, ok, if it has to a few yards away, I can mange. So I set it up across the room, at about 15' away, on a soft surface, and still, the sound was AWFUL. Still distorted but not as bad but strangely during playback the sound keeps hesitating, hiccupping, if you will. WTH? I've never seen anything like it and I've been using point and shoot cameras for this purpose for 20 years. ugh I'm returning it immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera with so many extras!
reviews.reviewText: This camera is very nice and so easy to use. It takes great photos and videos. I was impressed with how many accessories were included like micro SD card, charging cord, wall plug, cute bag, and more. You can also download your photos and videos to your computer for easy sharing with family and friends. It is a good quality camera and the price is good. I would recommend this 4K digital camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good starter Camera with many features
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So this camera is pretty good for a beginner, who wants their hands on an actual camera rather than a phone. It has a lot of options and I haven't explored them all but I was surprised to see burst shots, slow motion videos, and able to change from night, to back-lit, portraits, landscapes, etc within the camera. It does great for still photography and we enjoyed taking it on a hike with us. There is just a little lag time for fast action but we were also trying to take photos of very fast dirtbikes racing at the time. I'm not sure I could catch them well with a more advanced camera either, personally. I'd also like to mute the sound for menu changes which I'm sure can happen but that doesn't hamper the use of the camera overall. Easy to hold, came with everything you need from charger, double batteries, lens cover, carry case, wristlet, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a little bigger than the point and shoot it's replacing but it seems to take OK pictures. Zoom is good. Controls are a little clunky to handle but it will just take some getting used to. Price point is good. You won't get a Sony for this price but this is a good first camera or back-up to phone pics when traveling. It's pretty light and fits nicely in a day pack or purse. Hopefully I will grow to love it
